articles.author: José Ignacio Castañeda Perez, The News Journal
articles.title: Walmart temporarily closes Camden location as COVID-19 hospitalizations spike - The News Journal
articles.description: The closure is part of a company-initiated program that was enacted in response to the surge in COVID-19 cases nationwide.
articles.content: Walmart has temporarily closed its Camden store in central Delaware to allow for the location to be thoroughly cleaned, sanitized and restocked as the state experiences a winter surge in COVID-19 cas… [+2424 chars]
